dialogue:
[header name:Helpful Elder]
[speed value:medium]Here is a [color value:blue]pack[color value:regular][sprite id:pack/scale:.7]for you,[pause value:.3] young one.

[newpage wait:2]
[header name:Helpful Elder]
[speed value:medium]
You can look at your collected packs 
[color value:blue]with W,[color value:regular][pause value:.5] 
and open them if you [color value:blue]hold D.
[color value:regular]

[newpage wait:2.6]
[header name:Helpful Elder]
[speed value:medium]
Its important to choose which cards to 
[color value:red]consume and gain experience,[pause value:.7][color value:regular] 
and which to[color value:blue] keep and add to 
your buffer.[color value:regular]
name: Elder 1
